shared.model

Class Fascade

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.Fascade

  • public class Fascade
extends java.lang.Object
    The Facade class handles all communication and commands to and from the game model.

      • buildRoadAt

        public void buildRoadAt(client.data.PlayerInfo player,
               Edge edge)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Orders the construction of a road on that edge.
        Parameters:
        player -
        road_position -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        canBuildRoad() returns true
        Post-Conditions
        a road is built for that player on that edge. The server is notified., The player's resources are reduced by 1 wood and 1 brick

      • canBuyDevelopmentCard

        public boolean canBuyDevelopmentCard(client.data.PlayerInfo player)
        Tells whether a specified PlayerInfo can buy a Development card right now.
        Parameters:
        player -
        Pre-Conditions
        None
        Post-Conditions
        result = True when the player can afford a development card and it is their turn to buy things. /result = false otherwise.

      • buyDevelopmentCard

        public void buyDevelopmentCard(client.data.PlayerInfo player)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Buy a development card
        Parameters:
        player -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        PlayerInfo can buy a development card (see previous function)
        Post-Conditions
        the player has a new development card., The player's resources are reduced by 1 food and 1 ore and 1 wool

      • canBuildSettlement

        public boolean canBuildSettlement(client.data.PlayerInfo player,
                         Vertex location)
        Can this player build a settlement here?
        Parameters:
        player -
        location -
        Pre-Conditions
        the player is playing the game
        Post-Conditions
        returns true iff the player can legally put a settlement on that location

      • buildSettlement

        public void buildSettlement(client.data.PlayerInfo player,
                   Vertex location)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Build a settlement on that spot
        Parameters:
        player -
        location -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        canBuildSettlement() is true
        Post-Conditions
        a settlement is built by that player on the specified location, The player's resources are reduced by 1 food, 1 brick, 1 wood, and 1 wool

      • BuildCity

        public void BuildCity(client.data.PlayerInfo player,
             Vertex location)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Build a city on the Settlement that was previously there
        Parameters:
        player -
        location -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        canBuildCity() is true
        Post-Conditions
        a City replaces the player's settlement on that spot., The player's resources are reduced by 2 food and 3 ore

      • RollDice

        public int RollDice(client.data.PlayerInfo player)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Roll the dice and apply the consequences
        Parameters:
        player -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        canRollDice() is true
        Post-Conditions
        the dice are rolled and the consequences are applied to each player and the game state is advanced to the next turn phase

      • discardResources

        public void discardResources(ResourceList discard_list)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        discard_list -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        the player was forced by a rolled 7 to discard half and generated a list of half his resources to discard
        Post-Conditions
        the chosen resources are returned to the game bank

      • moveRobber

        public void moveRobber(int player,
              TerrainHex hex)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Move the Robber
        Parameters:
        hex -
        player -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        the player just rolled a 7
        Post-Conditions
        the robber is placed on the designated hex and the player's turn phase is set to rob

      • whoCanBeRobbed

        public int[] whoCanBeRobbed()
        Get a list of players who can be robbed because of where the robber is
        Pre-Conditions
        none
        Post-Conditions
        result = an array of indexes to the players that can be robbed. Or an empty array if none are possible

      • rob

        public void rob(int robber,
       int robbed)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        Rob the indicated player of a random specified card
        Parameters:
        robber -
        robbed -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        The player is in the rob phase of their turn and have not yet robbed, robber != robbed
        Post-Conditions
        The robbed player has one resource taken and given to the robber player at random., the turn phase is advanced

      • tradeAtMiscHarbor

        public void tradeAtMiscHarbor(int player,
                     ResourceList trade_in_cards,
                     ResourceList desired_card)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        use the 3-to-1 trade at a miscilaneous harbor
        Parameters:
        trade_in_card -
        desired_card -
        player -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        canTradeAtMiscHarbor() is true. The trade-in list has only 3 of the same resourse to trade in, the desired card is a list of a single card different from what they traded in
        Post-Conditions
        the player's resources are reduced by those 3 resources and increased by 1 of the desired card.

      • canTradeFourToOne

        public boolean canTradeFourToOne(int player,
                        ResourceList trade_in_cards,
                        ResourceList desired_cards)
        Can this player trade 4-to-1 on these parameters?
        Parameters:
        player -
        trade_in_card -
        desired_cards -
        Pre-Conditions
        none
        Post-Conditions
        True iff the player can legally make this trade at this time

      • tradeFourToOne

        public void tradeFourToOne(int player,
                  ResourceList trade_in_card,
                  ResourceList desired_card)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        use the 4-to-1 trade
        Parameters:
        trade_in_card -
        desired_card -
        player -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        canTradeFourToOne() is true. The trade in has only 4 of the same resourse to trade in, the desired card is a list with a single card different from what they traded in
        Post-Conditions
        the player's resources are reduced by those 4 resources and increased by 1 of the desired card.

        Post-Conditions

        public void updateModelFromJSON(java.lang.String json_model)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Update the model from the JSON string
        Parameters:
        json_model -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Pre-Conditions
        the server has sent an updated version of the model which must replace the current model
        Post-Conditions
